  • mordred.CPSA module

mordred.CPSA module¶

charged partial surface area descriptor.

References

  • doi:10.1021/ac00220a013

class mordred.CPSA.PNSA(version=1)[source]¶

Bases: VersionCPSABase

partial negative surface area descriptor.

\[{\rm PNSA}_1 = \sum_{a-} {\rm SA}_a^-\]

where \(\sum_{a-}\) means sum over negative charged atoms, \({\rm SA}_a^-\) is atomic partial surface area.

Parameters:

version (int) – one of versions

since = <Version('1.0.0')>¶
description()[source]¶
property config¶
explicit_hydrogens = True¶
